dublin_core.dcvalue: Hannah Bowen, Director of Research & Strategy, Malaria No More, Email: Hannah.Bowen@malarianomore.org | Frances Gonzales, Program Associate, mHealth Alliance, Email: fgonzales@mhealthalliance.org

A mobile application that provides education on malaria diagnosis and treatment using celebrity branded mass-media campaigns. The program uses tools, ringtones, messages and quizzes to spread malaria knowledge & messages in a user-driven way.
Made available in DSpace on 2020-10-14T10:20:02Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 1 nightwatch_mobile.pdf: 292454 bytes, checksum: 62cf8b1ac10098ad20db7ef9072411c4 (MD5)
Client education and behavior change communication, Malaria
